mapper.sql: select * from( select COUNT(ROW_CNT) AS EDU_CNT ,SUM(TRAINEE_CNT) AS TRAINEE_CNT ,EDU_DT ,RECEIPT_END_DATE ,EDU_DIV ,EDU_NM from( select A.ID ,A.APPLY_ID ,ROWNUM AS ROW_CNT ,(SELECT COUNT(ID) AS CNT FROM TB_ED_EDUCATION_SUB B WHERE B.APPLY_ID = A.APPLY_ID) AS TRAINEE_CNT ,C.EDU_DIV ,C.EDU_NM ,TO_CHAR(C.EDU_DT, 'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS EDU_DT ,TO_CHAR(C.RECEIPT_END_DATE, 'YY-MM-DD') AS RECEIPT_END_DATE from TB_ED_EDUCATION_MASTER A join TB_ED_EDUCATION_INFO C ON C.ID = A.EDU_ITEM ) X group by EDU_DT, RECEIPT_END_DATE, EDU_DIV, EDU_NM ) Z
